cotton.servicediscovery

Class DiscoveryProbe

  • java.lang.Object
    • cotton.servicediscovery.DiscoveryProbe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DiscoveryProbe
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DiscoveryProbe acts as a discovery request as well as a discovery response. The packet consists of a service name and a SocketAddress containing the targeted service address.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
